Articles.Content:
On Sunday, I posted a smart aleck thread about SpaceX. I shouldn't have done that.

SpaceX actually has a pretty good success to failure ratio with their launches.

My apologies.

I didn't see the thread, but now I've got to.

I absolve you in advance though. It takes real character to admit a mistake and apologise, especially to a general forum of peers. That sort of thing is symptomatic of why I love the KSP community as much as the game.

I'm sure the spaceX team face harsher criticism regularly, anyway.
You are forgiven. Just remember, the Kraken is always watching.

Eh, it happens. Thanks for being nice about it.

As this is not about KSP itself, however, please continue the discussion in the proper subforum.
